profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes applying machine learning to various tasks like personalization, fraud detection, and NLP, and managing the entire model lifecycle. While LLMs are mentioned, the core focus remains on traditional ML engineering principles and MLOps, aligning more closely with the ML Engineer profile.

phrases: work closely with the data team, product and finance
focus on a wide variety of projects
shaping these initiatives from the ground up
Design Machine Learning solutions for TicketSwap's unique product challenges
Producing data insights: extract value from data and drive improvements and strategic decisions
Work closely with the different stakeholders, understand their problems and come up with solutions
With data driven decision making playing an important role the ML products you develop will have real impact on customers and the business
job_tasks.justification: These phrases indicate an understanding of business context, stakeholder needs, and the impact of ML solutions on business goals and customer experience.

phrases: Our MLEs play a critical role in shaping these initiatives from the ground up - from conceptualizing new ideas to bringing them to life through development, deployment, and ongoing optimization.
Producing data insights: extract value from data and drive improvements and strategic decisions
job_tasks.justification: While not explicitly detailing data pipelines, the mention of extracting value from data and driving insights implies data handling and preparation as a foundational step.

phrases: leveraging open source large language models to enhance our platform
Apply Machine Learning / Artificial Intelligence to personalization, discovery, fraud detection and natural language processing
Design Machine Learning solutions
model prototyping and development
experiment management
Producing data insights
ML products you develop
job_tasks.justification: This category covers the core of building and adapting models, including traditional ML tasks (personalization, fraud detection) and generative AI (LLMs), as well as the process of experimentation and development.

phrases: bringing them to life through development, deployment, and ongoing optimization
Design Machine Learning solutions for TicketSwap's unique product challenges
ML products you develop will have real impact on customers and the business
job_tasks.justification: The description mentions developing and deploying ML solutions that have a real impact on customers and the business, implying the need for software development to integrate these models into applications.

phrases: deployment, and ongoing optimization
on-premise hardware for model prototyping and development
growing MLops infrastructure supports our team in experiment management, ensuring efficient tracking, smooth deployment, and meticulous monitoring of our models
Help with the continuing development of our MLops pipeline
continuous improvement and monitoring
job_tasks.justification: Explicit mentions of 'MLops infrastructure', 'experiment management', 'deployment', 'monitoring', and 'MLops pipeline' clearly indicate a strong focus on operationalizing and maintaining ML models.

ramping up our machine learning efforts
